scripts.deploy:dev:watch: dotenv -e .env.development.local -e .env.development -- cdk watch Recipes-development-Api --exclusively --profile recipes_development --context env=development --context skipDeployWebApp=true
scripts.destroy:dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -e .env.development -- cdk destroy --profile recipes_development --context env=development --context skipDeployWebApp=true
scripts.postdeploy:dev: npm run pull-stack-outputs:dev && npm run copy-outputs-to-dotenv:dev
scripts.postdeploy:staging: npm run pull-stack-outputs:staging && npm run copy-outputs-to-dotenv:staging
scripts.postdeploy:prod: npm run pull-stack-outputs:prod && npm run copy-outputs-to-dotenv:prod
scripts.diff:dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -e .env.development -- cdk diff --profile recipes_development --context env=development --context skipDeployWebApp=true
scripts.diff:staging: dotenv -e .env.staging.local -e .env.staging -- cdk diff --profile recipes_staging --context env=staging --context skipDeployWebApp=true
scripts.diff:prod: dotenv -e .env.production.local -e .env.production -- cdk diff --profile recipes_production --context env=production --context skipDeployWebApp=true
